oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Twenty-seventh annual Hill-Newsom family reunion, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about the Hill-Newsom family reunion. The caption reads: “Seen above are the guests who attended the 27th Easter Hill-Newsom family reunion, which was held March 24th at the Newsom home on Franklin Road at Murfreesboro. Left to right are: B. R. Newsom, H. C. Hill, Nashville; Mrs. H. C. Hill, Mrs. T. B. Newsom, Mrs. Jimmie Hastings, Mrs. Ernest Smith, Mrs. Gentry Christopher, Mrs. C. W. Allen, Mrs. Eugene Clark, Mr. and Mrs. George Hill, Nashville; Mr. and Mrs. C. F. Newsom and daughter of Chattanooga; Mr. and Mrs. William H. Newsom, Mrs. Tom Newsom, Jr., and son, Mr. and Mrs. George Clark and son, of Chattanooga; Sam H. Clark, Miss Frances Clark, Mr. and Mrs. Jack Evans and son, Mr. and Mrs. Alice Newsom, Miss ? Monks, Eddie Newsom, Grady McLeod, Will Kramer, and Mr. and Mrs. John Burnett.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
